main.name: Eric Lepki
main.description: Currently seeking a Full Stack Developer || Python Developer || C++ Developer Position
main.bio: Hi, I'm Eric, a Full Stack ReactJS Developer, and a System Analyst. I have competed in 5 hackathons across Texas. In one hackathon me and my team won the best AR app. The areas I'm most passionate about is cybersecurity, software development, and computer networking. I love to learn, teach, and grow. You'll usually find me wrangling with data, programming, or keeping up with the last news in the cybersecurity world.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: Information Systems Technology graduate with 2 years of programming experience in Python and C++.

education.degree: Bachelors in Computer Information Systems Technology
